query.sfwSql: Select * from sgt_death_notification sdn (nolock) left outer join sgt_person sp (nolock) on sp.person_id = sdn.person_id order by 1 desc
select count(*) from sgt_death_notification where death_notification_id <> @death_notification_id and person_id = @person_id
Select count(*) from sgt_death_notification WITH(NOLOCK) where person_id = @person_id and action_status_value not in ('CANC', 'ERRN')
Select count(*) from sgt_person where person_id = @person_id

SELECT DISTINCT(D.PERSON_ID), D.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION D LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA ON PA.PERSON_ID = D.PERSON_ID WHERE PA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL1','SUS2') AND D.DEATH_CERTIFIED_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY D.PERSON_ID DESC
delete SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ERROR where DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID

SELECT DISTINCT PER.PERSON_ID,PER.SSN, LEFT(PER.LAST_NAME,13) AS LAST_NAME, LEFT(PER.FIRST_NAME,10) AS FIRST_NAME, LEFT(PER.MIDDLE_NAME,7) AS MIDDLE_NAME, PER.DATE_OF_BIRTH, CASE PER.GENDER_VALUE WHEN 'MALE' THEN 'M' WHEN 'FEML' THEN 'F' ELSE '' END AS GENDER_VALUE FROM SGT_PERSON PER (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACCT ON ACCT.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA ON PA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID = PER.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV1 ON PAS.STATUS_ID = CV1.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV1.CODE_VALUE WHERE PER.DATE_OF_DEATH IS NULL AND ((ACCT.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL3','SUS1') AND ACCT.PLAN_ID = 19) OR (ACCT.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL2','ENL4') AND ACCT.PLAN_ID IN (8, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 22)) OR (ACCT.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL1','RTRD','SUS2') AND ACCT.PLAN_ID IN (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,20,23,24,25,26,27,28,29,30) OR ((CV1.DATA2 NOT IN ('CNLD','RPCD','TRMD')) AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (NOLOCK) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= GETDATE() ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC, PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC) )))

SELECT 'ACOD' AS 'DEATH_TYPE_VALUE', SDN.*,SPA.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=SPA.APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON APPACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'Y')='Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPASTAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID= SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE COD WITH(NOLOCK) ON COD.CODE_VALUE= SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE AND COD.CODE_ID=SPASTAT.STATUS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND BENACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE SPA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR','DISA') AND SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL AND SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID=( SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND COD.DATA2 IN ('RECV','SPND','REVW','APRD','TRMD') -- SYS PIR ID 2603 Even the Payee account status is terminated, should include in ACOD if the effective date is a future date AND SPASTAT.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE > = (CASE SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE WHEN 'TRMD' THEN DECEASED.DATE_OF_DEATH WHEN 'TRDS' THEN DECEASED.DATE_OF_DEATH ELSE SPASTAT.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE END) AND EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER HIS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID) AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

--FETCH ANY DECEASED WITH A PAYEE ACCOUNT IN RECEIVING, SUSPENDED, REVIEW OR APPROVED STATUS WHERE AT LEAST ONE PAYMENT HAS BEEN ISSUED.(FIRST BEN DEATH) SELECT 'FBED' AS 'DEATH_TYPE_VALUE', SDN.*,SPA.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=SPA.APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPASTAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID= SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE COD WITH(NOLOCK) ON COD.CODE_VALUE= SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE AND COD.CODE_ID=SPASTAT.STATUS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=BENACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE SPA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('PSTD','DETH') AND SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL AND SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID=( SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND COD.DATA2 IN ('RECV','SPND','REVW','APRD') AND EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER HIS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID) AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') AND BENEFICIARY_TYPE_VALUE='PRIM' ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

--FETCH ANY DECEASED WITH A PAYEE ACCOUNT IN RECEIVING, SUSPENDED, REVIEW OR APPROVED STATUS WHERE AT LEAST ONE PAYMENT HAS BEEN ISSUED.(ALTERNATE PAYEE DEATH) SELECT 'ALPD' AS 'DEATH_TYPE_VALUE', SDN.*,SPA.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.DRO_APPLICATION_ID=SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPASTAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID= SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE COD WITH(NOLOCK) ON COD.CODE_VALUE= SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE AND COD.CODE_ID=SPASTAT.STATUS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND APP.DRO_APPLICATION_ID=BENACC.DRO_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NOT NULL AND SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID=( SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND COD.DATA2 IN ('RECV','SPND','REVW','APRD') AND EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER HIS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID) AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') AND BENEFICIARY_TYPE_VALUE='PRIM' ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

SELECT SDN.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION EL WITH(NOLOCK) ON EL.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= ACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND BENACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= ACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE PLN.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE='INSR' AND IBS_FLAG='Y' AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

--FETCH ANY DECEASED WITH A DEFERRED COMP OR OTHER 457/403(B) PLAN ACCOUNT IN ENROLLED OR SUSPENDED PLAN PARTICIPATION STATUS SELECT SDN.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND BENACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= ACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE PLN.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE='DEFF' AND PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE ='ENL3' AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(ISNULL(PR.PAYMENT_RECOVERY_ID,0)),0) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM SGT_PAYMENT_RECOVERY PR WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PR.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PR.STATUS_VALUE IN('INPR', 'APRD') AND PA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID = @PAYEEPERSLINKID

DELETE FROM SGT_COR_DEATH_NOTIFICATION WHERE DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_COR_RETIREMENT WHERE DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_COR_INSURANCE WHERE DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_COR_PAYEE_ACCOUNT WHERE DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_COR_BENE_DEP WHERE DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID DELETE FROM SGT_COR_BENE_DEP_TO WHERE DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID = @DEATH_NOTIFICATION_ID

SELECT 'ACOD' AS 'DEATH_TYPE_VALUE', SDN.*,SPA.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=SPA.APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON APPACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'Y')='Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPASTAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID= SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE COD WITH(NOLOCK) ON COD.CODE_VALUE= SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE AND COD.CODE_ID=SPASTAT.STATUS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND BENACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE SPA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR','DISA') AND SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL AND SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID=( SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND COD.DATA2 IN ('RECV','SPND','REVW','APRD','TRMD') -- SYS PIR ID 2603 Even the Payee account status is terminated, should include in ACOD if the effective date is a future date AND SPASTAT.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE > = (CASE SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE WHEN 'TRMD' THEN DECEASED.DATE_OF_DEATH WHEN 'TRDS' THEN DECEASED.DATE_OF_DEATH ELSE SPASTAT.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE END) AND EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER HIS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID) AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') AND SDN.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

--FETCH ANY DECEASED WITH A PAYEE ACCOUNT IN RECEIVING, SUSPENDED, REVIEW OR APPROVED STATUS WHERE AT LEAST ONE PAYMENT HAS BEEN ISSUED.(FIRST BEN DEATH) SELECT 'FBED' AS 'DEATH_TYPE_VALUE', SDN.*,SPA.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=SPA.APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPASTAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID= SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE COD WITH(NOLOCK) ON COD.CODE_VALUE= SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE AND COD.CODE_ID=SPASTAT.STATUS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=BENACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE SPA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('PSTD','DETH') AND SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL AND SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID=( SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND COD.DATA2 IN ('RECV','SPND','REVW','APRD') AND EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER HIS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID) AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') AND BENEFICIARY_TYPE_VALUE='PRIM' AND SDN.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

--FETCH ANY DECEASED WITH A PAYEE ACCOUNT IN RECEIVING, SUSPENDED, REVIEW OR APPROVED STATUS WHERE AT LEAST ONE PAYMENT HAS BEEN ISSUED.(ALTERNATE PAYEE DEATH) SELECT 'ALPD' AS 'DEATH_TYPE_VALUE', SDN.*,SPA.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.DRO_APPLICATION_ID=SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPASTAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID= SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE COD WITH(NOLOCK) ON COD.CODE_VALUE= SPASTAT.STATUS_VALUE AND COD.CODE_ID=SPASTAT.STATUS_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND APP.DRO_APPLICATION_ID=BENACC.DRO_APPLICATION_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NOT NULL AND SPASTAT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID=( SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND COD.DATA2 IN ('RECV','SPND','REVW','APRD') AND EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER HIS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID) AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') AND BENEFICIARY_TYPE_VALUE='PRIM' AND SDN.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

SELECT SDN.*,BEN.*, BENACC.*, DECEASED.*, BENORG.* FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION SDN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON DECEASED WITH(NOLOCK) ON DECEASED.PERSON_ID=SDN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ELECTION EL WITH(NOLOCK) ON EL.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= ACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DECEASED.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY BENACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID AND BENACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID= ACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPER WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=BEN.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID WHERE PLN.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE='INSR' AND IBS_FLAG='Y' AND ISNULL(IS_PAYEE_DEATH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')='N' AND SDN.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC') AND SDN.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID ORDER BY DECEASED.PERSON_ID

SELECT SUM(PA) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS PA FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LIFE_HISTORY PALH WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A WITH(NOLOCK) ON PALH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE A.PERSON_ID = @DECEASEDPERSONID AND PALH.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND @DATEOFDEATH BETWEEN PALH.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND ISNULL(PALH.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND PALH.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE <> CASE WHEN PALH.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN PALH.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE ELSE '01/01/2900' END
UNION ALL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS PA FROM SGT_PERSON_CONTACT PC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT A WITH(NOLOCK) ON PC.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.PLAN_ID = 13 AND PC.RELATIONSHIP_VALUE = 'SPOU' --AND PC.STATUS_VALUE = 'ACT' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LIFE_HISTORY PALH WITH(NOLOCK) ON PALH.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE PC.CONTACT_PERSON_ID = @DECEASEDPERSONID AND PALH.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND COVERAGE_AMOUNT > 0 AND LEVEL_OF_COVERAGE_VALUE = 'SPSL' AND @DATEOFDEATH BETWEEN PALH.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND ISNULL(PALH.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,'01/01/2900') AND PALH.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE <> CASE WHEN PALH.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN PALH.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE ELSE '01/01/2900' END )TEMP

DECLARE @lintDays INT = 0, @SYSMGMTDATE DATE SELECT @lintDays = DATA1 FROM SGS_CODE_VALUE WHERE CODE_ID=52 AND CODE_VALUE = 'BRDY'
SELECT @SYSMGMTDATE = BATCH_DATE FROM SGS_SYSTEM_MANAGEMENT
--print @lintDays SELECT * FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION DN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON DN.PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID WHERE DEATH_CERTIFIED_FLAG = 'Y' AND SP.MARITAL_STATUS_VALUE = 'MRID' AND DATEADD(day, @lintDays, DN.DATE_OF_DEATH_CERTIFIED_ON) <= @SYSMGMTDATE
SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT WHERE PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID = @DECEASEDPERSONID AND DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(distinct SPD.DEPENDENT_PERSLINK_ID) FROM SGT_PERSON_DEPENDENT SPD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEPENDENT SPAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID = SPD.PERSON_DEPENDENT_ID WHERE (@DATEOFDEATH BETWEEN SPAD.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPAD.END_DATE, '01/01/2900' )OR SPAD.START_DATE > @DATEOFDEATH ) AND SPD.PERSON_ID = @PERSONID
